dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description:
MCE - Many-Core Engine for Perl providing parallel processing
capabilities. MCE spawns a pool of workers and therefore does not fork a
new process per each element of data. Instead, MCE follows a bank
queuing model. Imagine the line being the data and bank-tellers the
parallel workers. MCE enhances that model by adding the ability to chunk
the next n elements from the input stream to the next available worker.
dependencies.name: perl-mce

dependencies.description: Critique Perl source code for best-practices.
dependencies.name: perl-perl-critic

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
